Articles.Content: Not sure how long this has been around, but hopefully it's a sign we're getting close?
Seems to need the net framework to work tho..
Shssshs - the new patcher is a secret ... don't tell anyone ...
I'm tellin
How do I get it???
I just loaded KSP, and it prompted me saying 'New patcher is available'. Pretty fancy!
Doesn't work with me
In what way?
Unity engine already needs .Net / Mono, so how is that a problem?
Like I dontbgetbthe pop up. Though I only tried last night I'll try again when im done eating

That'll be it then. I got it about 2 hours ago.

(EDIT) Lies...

More like 3 and a half hours.

Edited September 5, 2012 by Boex
I got it yesterday, maybe they are testing it before realese?

I tried at 11AM(GMT +2) got nothing.

tried it before 5 minutes again, got nothing.

No word from the devs?

I'm hoping this is a sign...A SIGN FROM THE GODS OF KSP, that 0.17 might be drawing close...

Maybe...?

pls?

I got a little gray box when I started the game, I agreed to the update, it asked me to wait for a moment, and then it went away. Uh, did it do anything? It didn't come up the next time I started the game.

I am far too excited about this. Like, it's pretty silly how much I want .17 - BUT I know we all have to give the devs time to make it as close to perfect as they can get. Sooooo in that regard, shine on you crazy devs. Shine on.
Not showing up for me, maybe they're releasing the patcher in waves?
Nothing here as well.
Just popped up for me. I didn't update yet as I wanted to get feedback from you guinea pigs first to see if it crashes the game or something, hahaha!
I have the updater, but I cant update, I dont think its released yet
I dont have it either. Maybe because im using a recently downloaded version of the game its got the new patcher?

I got a little gray box when I started the game, I agreed to the update, it asked me to wait for a moment, and then it went away. Uh, did it do anything? It didn't come up the next time I started the game.

Click on the patcher in your KSP directory, and it's got a new, faster interface. Pretty fancy.
The .17 changelog hasn't been edited since Aug.27th, maybe it will come soon? A bit of a surprise perhaps

Click on the patcher in your KSP directory, and it's got a new, faster interface. Pretty fancy.
Okay, that comes up with a little box asking me if I want to upgrade or fix the game, which is all well enough, except that the response boxes run off the edge and I can neither resize nor scroll around the box. Anyway, won't the game just find any updates from the title screen when I start it up?
I got nothing on the menu, is this .16.2?
